scripts.demo: yarn install:all && yarn build:once && yarn demo:run
scripts.install:all: if [ ! -d ./node_modules/yarn/ ]; then npm run install:yarn; fi && yarn install
scripts.bump:minor: (cd src/client/ && npm version patch) && (cd src/server/ && npm version patch) && git commit -am 'release new minor'
scripts.release:build: yarn clean:all && yarn instal && yarn build:once && yarn buid:umd && yarn test
scripts.release:publish: (cd src/client/ && npm publish) && (cd src/server/ && npm publish)
